version_description:
***BIG UPDATE***
- Now the battles are more attractive with many new effects
- Update Versus mode. Now it more balance.

- Fix time bugs
- Add more tutorial when user lose

- Watch video to test hero
- Watch video received free coins
- Watch video X2 coins
- Watch video to spine Lucky wheel received gift
- Earn coins esier

- Reduce Ads
- Improve user exprience
- Fix bugs

***BIG UPDATE ***
- Add many ways to earn coins and gems.
- Fix graphics.
- Fix bugs.

*** BIG UPDATE ***
- Open PvP mode! Join PvP League, climb top of leaderboard and get many big prizes.
- Add many super offer and new heroes.
- New Graphics.
- Improve performance.
- Fix bugs.

***BIG UPDATE***
- Add new Episode: Bat Stickman Story. Level 135-156.
- Add 8 new playable characters: Clown Original, Clown Suicide Team, Queen Harly Suicide, Robino, Red Robino, Wings of Night, Red Todd.
- Improve performance.
